description: Describes the specified target groups or all of your target groups. By default, all target groups are described. Alternatively, you can specify one of the following to filter the results: the ARN of the load balancer, the names of one or more target groups, or the ARNs of one or more target groups. To describe the targets for a target group, use DescribeTargetHealth. To describe the attributes of a target group, use DescribeTargetGroupAttributes.
